hero.desc: Helping others and making a difference in the world is what will help to make the world a better place by improving people's lives. One person at a time, one day at a time, and one project at a time, you can make a difference that will leave a lasting impact on the world.

donation.desc: When you give to Vively you trust us to steward your donation thoughtfully toward maximum positive impact.
donation.check_1: Hide my name from the public
donation.check_2: It's okay to contact me in the future.
